Comment 15: 
I had a quick stab, trying to debug / understand what is really happening, but I could
only see that once first exception started, runtime·sighandler is hit 3 times, while
going into runtime·newstack couple times as well. I think that

r->Eip = (uintptr)runtime·sigpanic;

complicates everything even more. Plus if you add a chance of exception raised inside
exception handling code, then anything is possible.

Alex
